title:
KYBO 3.0.0
Star Trek Collection
Star Trek: The Motion Picture http://vidto.me/4lqikfei80lm https://d1466nnw0ex81e.cloudfront.net/n_iv/600/1035803.jpg http://www.empireonline.com/images/uploaded/star-trek-the-motion-picture-uniforms.jpg When an alien spacecraft of enormous power is spotted approaching Earth, Admiral Kirk resumes command of the Starship Enterprise in order to intercept, examine and hopefully stop the intruder.
Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan http://thevideo.me/9th93khjhfv8 http://www.standbyformindcontrol.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/05/khan-poster.jpg http://img3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20140707230006/rifftrax/images/b/be/Star-trek-ii-the-wrath-of-khan-original.jpg With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using his son's life-generating device, the Genesis Device, as the ultimate weapon.
Star Trek III: The Search for Spock http://180upload.com/4ogvqldsyxiz http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMTYyMTY1MjE2NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzY3MTYyMQ@@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://fc01.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2014/065/5/a/star_trek_iii___the_search_for_spock_by_1darthvader-d795tx9.jpg Admiral Kirk and his bridge crew risk their careers stealing the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Spock's body.
Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home http://180upload.com/pt3cbz0vw86m http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ3MzcxMjAxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODY3MTYyMQ@@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://www.trekmate.org.uk/wp-content/uploads/2013/08/Star-Trek-IV-The-Voyage-Home.jpg To save Earth from an alien probe, Admiral Kirk and his fugitive crew go back in time to 20th century Earth to retrieve the only beings who can communicate with it, humpback whales.
Star Trek V: The Final Frontier http://vodlocker.com/or4cqn6splfw http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ4MTU3NjI5NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTU3MjQyMQ@@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://www.dangermouse.net/blog/images/trek/ST5_2.jpg Captain Kirk and his crew must deal with Mr. Spock's long-lost half-brother who hijacks the Enterprise for an obsessive search for God at the center of the galaxy.
Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country http://www.novamov.com/video/m3di3tmu25h5l http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BOTU1MDI5MzQwNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTgwMTMzMQ@@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://www.mattfind.com/12345673215-3-2-3_img/movie/z/m/j/star_trek_vi_the_undiscovered_country_1991_1284x1024_384751.jpg On the eve of retirement, Kirk and McCoy are charged with assassinating the Klingon High Chancellor and imprisoned. The Enterprise crew must help them escape to thwart a conspiracy aimed at sabotaging the last best hope for peace.
Star Trek Generations http://www.novamov.com/video/ud7cbq5ajxhv6 http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BNjIwOTcxMTQ5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjgxNTEyMQ@@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://th04.deviantart.net/fs70/PRE/f/2013/295/8/0/star_trek___generations_by_1darthvader-d6re2ho.jpg Captain Picard, with the help of supposedly dead Captain Kirk, must stop a madman willing to murder on a planetary scale in order to enter an energy ribbon.
Star Trek: First Contact http://www.novamov.com/video/g6es5672qcxp8 http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMjA5MDA0NTg0N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTQ1NDgyMQ@@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://images.amcnetworks.com/ifc.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/10/621_356_star_trek_first_contact.jpg Captain Picard and his crew pursue the Borg back in time to stop them from preventing Earth's first contact with an alien species. They also make sure that Zefram Cochrane makes his famous maiden flight at warp speed.
Star Trek: Insurrection http://vodlocker.com/elv83temsvl0 http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMTMwNTE1MjY2Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDU1NzgyMQ@@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://www.thetimewarriors.co.uk/blog/wp-content/uploads/2013/06/star-trek-insurrection_20879_4ea5c6c334f8633bdc000541_1320209740.jpg When the crew of the Enterprise learn of a Federation conspiracy against the inhabitants of a unique planet, Captain Picard begins an open rebellion.
Star Trek Nemesis http://180upload.com/mx81r7c84h6k http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMjAxNjY2NDY3NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjA0MTEzMw@@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://www.blackgate.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/12/Nemesisposter.jpg After the Enterprise is diverted to the Romulan homeworld Romulus, supposedly because they want to negotiate a peace treaty, the Federation soon find out the Romulans are planning an attack on Earth.
Star Trek (2009) http://180upload.com/o2llyx6gm8b7 http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMTM3Mzg1ODkxM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjM2Mzg5Mg@@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://www.flickeringmyth.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/star-trek-2009.jpg The brash James T. Kirk tries to live up to his father's legacy with Mr. Spock keeping him in check as a vengeful, time-traveling Romulan creates black holes to destroy the Federation one planet at a time.
Star Trek Into Darkness http://180upload.com/qjxu76ztj8m3 http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMTk2NzczOTgxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODQ5ODczOQ@@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://www.blastr.com/sites/blastr/files/Star-Trek-Into-Darkness-2013-Wallpaper.jpg After the crew of the Enterprise find an unstoppable force of terror from within their own organization, Captain Kirk leads a manhunt to a war-zone world to capture a one-man weapon of mass destruction.
